amendment.description: To add a provision relating to the term of approval of appraisals by the interdepartmental review team.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5108 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5108 proposed by Senator Hutchison for Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S10529-10530; text: CR S10529-10530) To add a provision relating to the term of approval of appraisals by the interdepartmental review team.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5108 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5108 proposed by Senator Hutchison for Senator Domenici.
